title: @@@Stunningly renovated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home in Atlanta+++
posting_body: ['Ready Now!', 'This 2,289 sqft home is vacant.', 'Stunningly renovated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home in Atlanta.', 'This home features all new flooring, paint, counters and stainless steel appliances.', 'Call to schedule a viewing today.', 'Not having seen the property is not a valid reason for a refund of any monies paid nor does it invalidate any lease signed.', 'Please be advised that the sq ft and other home features provided may be approximate.', 'More information ::', 'show contact info', '..', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', 'Hi, my name is Brian.', 'I need a room in a nice house with a bath.', 'I’m the perfect tenant in regards to I’m rarely home.', 'I own my own company and work seven days a week.', 'I’m a non smoker and drinker.', 'You won’t even know you have a roommate because I’m gone so much.', 'Please respond with your number and location of your room.', 'Thanks so much, Brian', 'Hi all!', 'I’m a 26 year old professional will be relocating to from Miami.', "I work in finance so will be in the office Monday through Thursday 8-7 but typically work from home on Friday's.", 'I’m super chill, clean and career focused', 'but I do like to go out on the weekends!', 'Hoping the place is furnished if not totally cool too!Please be around my age!', 'Also down to look at spots with a potential roomate.', 'Looking to be fully moved in by mid August/September!', 'I’m relocating to Chicago area Sept 1st to take a job with American Airlines.', 'I currently work for United.', 'Just waiting for all my paperwork to come back.', 'I’m a veteran who served 9 years.', 'I’m in my mids 30’s', 'I receive income from VA as well as my job with the Airlines.', 'With Proof of income.', 'I’m hoping to find a room for efficiency for up to 6 months.', 'I have no criminal record, no smoker, drink occasionally.', 'U can contact me through here or 67eight-9sixfour-38nineeight.', 'Bless', 'Coming back to Joliet for work.', 'Looking for a simple room to rent.', 'Need a bed to sleep on or even couch.', 'No drugs, drinking or bad habits.', 'Not likely to have any company', 'I do not have pets', "I'm not loud I cause no drama", 'Not a lot of coming and going', 'Clean and tidy', "I'll be waking up early and going to work.", 'Handy around the house.', 'Can make repairs and/or do chores to help out.', 'I am a single professional mid 30s with a musical/artistic side.', "I don't drink any alcohol, and I have a friendly cat.", 'I am looking for either a 1bed apartment with some office space, or a room in a house.', 'I am naturally extremely chill and seeking similar types to live with/rent from.', '420 friendly of course.', 'I am extremely clean & organized.', 'Move in September 1-15.', 'Flexible on any north side neighborhood.', 'Thanks!', 'a Gwm needing a room in the Highland/Lynwood area ,Hammond isnt working for me.', 'open to share, I can do chores errands whatever household things that need to get done for you.', 'I can also contribute as I am here for a new job in the area with a startup media/video production co. I am currently working and saving for my transition also ...', 'so yes i need a place local. .', 'I can do housework or whatever else needs done.', 'This area only please .', 'Im not looking to re-locate from here.', 'I am single with no "baggage".', 'If you identify as gender neutral and are of the same interest as i am and are looking for a roommate .', 'i would love that also.', '24, , looking to move out and have a little more independence with the help of a roommate.', 'Can make plans to rent together, or move in with someone renting out a room.', 'Working at Amazon, bringing home a fair amount of dosh.', 'Really big gamer, if you love a large variety of videogames and anime we will get along well!', "Can be a little reclusive from time to time but when I warm up to you I'm real friendly.", 'I also enjoy cooking, pretty awesome at it.', "If you wanna know more you can shoot me an email, it hasn't changed since middle school", 'and I use it all the time.', 'I also use Discord, you can add me on there at Chaon#1278', 'My pregnant girlfriend and I and our 3 children are in desperate need of a place to live.', 'We have been staying with my sister but she is on the verge of losing her place.', 'I do under the table work', "but I don't make much money looking for help please and", 'I am looking for a private owner or landlord.', 'I have been living at my house for 17 years and my landlord is selling it.', 'I only have til October to did something and am having a hard time.', 'Looking for a 1 or 2 bedroom 800-1300 a month.', 'Please and thank you', 'ISO rental house in greater rockford area for young couple (aged 27 & 22).. beloit, belvidere, roscoe, loves park, machesney park, south beloit, cherry valley, etc', 'is employed, previous homeowner.', 'starts work on sept 6, good credit.', 'both work in IT', 'needs to be at least 2bd but prefer 3bd+.. 1+ bath', 'standalone house, no shared rooms/properties please', 'needs to be okay with 2 big dogs (great pyrenees) & 2 cats.', 'all well-behaved and housebroken and very friendly.', 'willing to pay pet deposits/fees', 'fenced yard is preferred but not necessary', 'move-in ready by sept.', '1st', 'at the latest, earlier is fine.', 'looking to pay at most $1200/mo but open to discussion', 'Cheap room for ppl that are clean and will act like I not there .', 'We leave no mess behind , have responsibility and will take on chores for house', "Without a problem also I can fix slot , basically anything for the house beside electric so if I'm staying there I will fix the place up for free and also if the room we can rent is from a older single ladies", "Who don't have any idea how to fix then I'm perfect", 'I work as skilled tradesmen on the side as well as possible helping a older single ladies out no problem maybe bored n wanna see a athletic young stud naked or ask for a favor in return for rent', 'Hi I’m 29 year old seeking immediate room.', 'I am new to area and seeking employment.', 'I have side hustles that keep money.', 'I can afford to pay $175 weekly not really much of a deposit maybe an extra $100 for a deposit.', 'I am looking for a sane roommate and a clean safe place i can rent.', 'If you have something please contact me as soon as possible.', 'Thanks so much!', 'I’m 29 year old seeking a room, I am in search of a job', 'but I currently do odd jobs to keep money.', 'I am willing to pay $175 per week, I need a room asap, until I can save up and get on my feet.', 'I can’t afford a deposit', 'but maybe I can pay the first week and $100 deposit.', 'I really need a safe place to sleep shower and rejuvenate.', 'I am clean friendly love to cook and maintain a clean functioning house.', 'I am a good room mate , I’ve Ben staying at a friends house', 'but I really want my own room.', 'I need it right away.', 'I’m looking in Jersey but if you have a safe place and are a sane person and willing to help me , please contact me asap.']
